response:
Subacute slurred speech, ataxic gait, right-sided limb dysmetria and dysdiadochokinesia with gaze-evoked right-beating nystagmus localise to the right cerebellar hemisphere; isolated reduced visual acuity with RAPD in the left eye localises to the left optic nerve. Normal tone, power, reflexes and sensation argue against corticospinal, basal ganglia, peripheral nerve or spinal cord pathology.

lesion_locations = ["right cerebellar hemisphere", "left optic nerve"]
